type.description: Enum value for the kind of alert. The range 0 - 99 is reserved for nrfcloud defined types, >= 100 can be custom user defined types

value.description: This represents the value that triggered the alert. For instance, if a threshold was crossed, this is the violating value

ts.description: Unix timestamp given in milliseconds when the alert occurred
Unix timestamp given in milliseconds when the alert occurred

seq.description: Sequence number of the message. This is a counter, used for ordering message if `ts` not available/used
Sequence number of the message. This is a counter, used for ordering message if `ts` not available/used
